ygData.subject: I start a Druid in Innoruk,
ygData.msgSnippet: I going to start a Druid in Innoruk, Halfling to be exact. Name will be Veteran, last name (when I hit 20) will be Soldier :) Since no people Druid there I
ygData.messageBody:
I going to start a Druid in Innoruk, Halfling to be exact. Name will be
Veteran, last name (when I hit 20) will be Soldier :)
Since no people Druid there I think I can survive lah. But damn cham, how to
catch up with all of you har? I power level my Cazic Druid for 6 hours and
managed to hit 7 in Misty, almost 8 liao. At that rate I have to powergame
like xiao to get even with all of you all.
Don't know if can do the same in Innoruk anot, hope can lah, or I also damn
sianz. See all of you level 20 I level 10 cannot group :(
One more thing, what's is everyone's name in Innoruk? List down leh, if not
I go in I also blur blur one, and what name is the guild ah? I new to this
list so don't know.
BTW, I just found this out yesterday. I am on a mapping expedition in
E.Karana and came across a spot where Gnoll Reaver (Day) and Undead Reavers
(Night) spawn. It's at the lower left corner of E.Karana and all I can say
is that they give obscene XP for their level. All con blue to my level 18
Mage and after killing abt. 40 in a group of 3, I am almost 19 liao(from
only 1 bubble), just abt. 1/2 a bubble more. The number may be wrong, but in
a 3 way XP split, I can always see the change in my XP bar when my group
kill one. Go check it out and see for yourself. Loot wise is sucks, they
drop occasional RawHide armor and at most carry 1pp. Most is abt. a few sp
to 3gp. Last, don't think of soloing there, those Undeads ones will ignore
the pet and go straight for you. Other also cannot solo, they hit for like
30-40 and can stun.
